text: Gronau (Westf.) is a city in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia. It is near the border with the Netherlands, about 10 km east of Enschede. As of 2018, the city has about 48,000 people living there. Rock musician and singer Udo Lindenberg was born here. == Twin towns == Gronau is twinned with: * Bromsgrove, England, United Kingdom * Epe, Netherlands * Mezőberény, Hungary == References == == Other websites == * * Official website Category:Borken (district)
title: Gronau, North Rhine-Westphalia
